intro.header: <0>First thing's first</0>. Here is the quick overview of our onboarding process that consists of <0>two steps</0>.

step1.content: Create your business profile to boost your digital presence. Add your business information, menu offering, photo gallery, delivery partners, among others.

step2.content: Discover our product and if you have any question, feel free to ask them through our chatbot button.

step1.title: Create Your Business Profile
step1.subtitle: This is an example of a business profile once onboarding is completed.

service.content: We strongly recommend you <0>add service redirections links</0> to your own website & your partner platforms.

step1.swipe: Swipe the phone up and down to see the full profile

hint.title: This is your business profile
hint.subtitle: Fill in your basic information. Once done, it will automatically be displayed on the phone screen as a preview.

logo.drag_file: Choose a file or drag it here

upload_pictures.hint: Please insert a high quality picture/photo that shows the atmosphere of your business (preferably the interior).

must_try.hint: Highlight your best sellers directly on your profile.

lookingGood.subheader: Please <0>check your profile</0> preview by swiping the phone up and down before publishing it.
lookingGood.hint: You will be able to add more information after publishing your profile.

confirmation.header: Congratulations, you <0>requested to publish</0> your business profile
confirmation.subheader: It will take <0>24 hours to be live</0>. (unless your business profile was already listed on our platform: in that case you are all set!) <1/> Once your profile is published you will receive a confirmation email. <1/><0>You will always be able to make any changes</0> to your profile once it is published.
